hero.title: I'm Isaac Shea.
hero.subtitle: I'm a software developer and interaction designer based in Brisbane, Australia. I write sotware with a strong focus on user experience and functional design.
hero.avatarAlt: A headshot of Isaac Shea on a beach.

wolfram.name: Wolfram (Coming Soon)
wolfram.description: A brilliantly simple workout tracker for iOS.

threaditor.name: Threaditor
threaditor.description: Draft and publish content to Threads, Bluesky and Mastodon from a single app.

valence.name: Valence
valence.description: My personal design framework, used to make cross-platform apps like Threaditor and Filedrop.

filedrop.name: Filedrop
filedrop.description: A simple app to make sharing between web, iOS and Android quicker and easier.

realmix.name: Realmix (retired)
realmix.description: An app to build collaborative Spotify playlists with friends in real-time.

footer.joke: All projects were made using 100% ethically-sourced ideas.
